Package org.encog.engine

Interface Summary
EngineMachineLearning Generic interface to a Machine Learning class, such as a neural network or SVM.
EngineNeuralNetwork An interface that defines a neural network.
StatusReportable This class allows for Encog jobs to report their current status, as they run.
 

Class Summary
EncogEngine The Encog Engine.
 

Exception Summary
EncogEngineError General error class for Encog.
